mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party_post(user_num, title, content) VALUES(#{userNum}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id AS postId, p.user_num AS userNum, p.title, p.content, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.updated_at AS updatedAt, p.view_count AS viewCount, i.image_url AS imageUrl FROM party_post p JOIN user u ON p.user_num = u.user_num LEFT JOIN post_image i ON p.post_id = i.post_id
